meanings.sent1: The cake had a chocolatey frosting that made it look delicious.
meanings.sent2: The hot cocoa had a rich, chocolatey taste that warmed me up.
meanings.sent3: The chocolatey scent of the candles filled the room with sweetness.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in a chocolatey hue, like a giant dessert.
meanings.sent5: The chocolatey color of the sofa reminded me of a cozy cocoa drink.

meanings.definition: Having a flavor or aroma of chocolate.
meanings.sent1: The cookies were so chocolatey that they melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent2: The ice cream was creamy and chocolatey, a perfect treat on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: The chocolatey aroma from the bakery made my stomach growl in anticipation.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was smooth and chocolatey, soothing everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The chocolatey flavor of the coffee lingered on my taste buds, making me crave more.
